ComicInfo.Summary: Jail Break Badge: A game of capture the flag becomes more than it seems when Diana confronts the Lumberjanes and reveals that the bow Molly claimed previously is actually hers, and accuses the Lumberjanes of being agents of Apollo. The Lumberjanes return the bow and agree to help Diana if she agrees to tell them what's going on. Jen wants in on the action.
